<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create New Custom Metric"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/metrics/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new custom metric type for tracking SLA performance. Custom metrics allow organizations to define organization-specific measurements beyond the built-in metric types.

**Workflow Example**
1. Review existing metrics: [GET /api/v1.0/metrics/types](/docs/api/slas/list-metrics) to avoid duplicates.
2. Define the metric configuration in the request body (name, calculation method, thresholds).
3. Call this endpoint: [POST /api/v1.0/metrics/new](/docs/api/slas/create-metric) with the metric definition.
4. Use the returned MetricId when configuring SLAs.

**Related Endpoints:**
- [GET /api/v1.0/metrics](/docs/api/slas/list-metric-metrics) - List all custom metrics
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/metrics/\{id\}](/docs/api/slas/delete-metric-metrics) - Remove a custom metric

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
